snippet: FIFA says it has suspended Brazil's team spokesman from matchday duty for the rest of the World Cup after he clashed with a Chile player....

headline.print_headline: Brazil Team Spokesman Gets 4-Match Ban From Duty
headline.main: Brazil Team Spokesman Gets 4-Match Ban From Duty

lead_paragraph: FIFA says it has suspended Brazil's team spokesman from matchday duty for the rest of the World Cup after he clashed with a Chile player.
